Description: Fragment of incurving rim and body of North Ionian pottery bird bowl; interior glazed with band of purple and white stripes; exterior: front part of bird with hatched body and two carelessly drawn rosettes; no ground line; top of rim glazed. Brown-buff clay with much white included matter.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 46.2.2)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 255, no. 7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.079)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 78, Nau 9, pl. 3a)
